Source.Name: giflib
Source.Summary: GIFLIB is a package of portable tools and library routines for working with GIF images
Source.Description: The giflib package contains a shared library of functions for loading and saving GIF format image files. It is API and ABI compatible with libungif, the library which supported uncompressed GIFs while the Unisys LZW patent was in effect.

Package.Name: giflib
